name: Shiinotic
description: The Illuminating Pokémon. It puts its prey to sleep and siphons off their vitality through the tip of its arms. If one of its kind is weakened, it helps by sending it vitality.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.description: This Pokémon knows the Light cantrip and can cast it at will.

abilities.name: Effect Spore
abilities.description: When hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a 4, deal an amount of grass damage equal to your proficiency modifier to your attacker.

abilities.name: Rain Dish
abilities.description: In rainy conditions, this Pokémon heals for an amount of HP equal to its proficiency bonus at the end of each of its turns.
